CustomField.description:
If Percentage, the limits specify how much the user can discount (e.g. 25 means 25% and the limit is calculated as: ListPrice * (1 - Limit / 100.0) )
If Fixed, the limits are the specific price that the user can discount to (e.g. 0.10 means 0.11 is fine but 0.09 is outside the limit)
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Percentage: 25 means 25% and the limit is calculated as: ListPrice * (1 - Limit / 100.0)
Fixed: 0.10 means 0.11 is fine but 0.099 is not
CustomField.label: Limit Type
